backend/main.mo: Defines a Motoko actor for storing leads with a submit function and a query to return all leads.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features, associated files, components, and requirement IDs for build traceability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of key frontend files and components for quick reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles with extensive OKLCH design tokens and dark mode variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry with SEO‑optimized title and meta description plus Inter font loading.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering the Softevia landing page.
frontend/src/components/leads/LeadCaptur: Modal dialog wrapper that displays the lead capture form with backdrop and close controls.
Lead form handling input validation, submission, and success state display.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Capabi: Renders a grid of six AI and analytics capability cards with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Footer: Footer with branding, quick navigation links, CTA, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Header: Responsive marketing header with navigation links, smooth scrolling, and demo request handling.
frontend/src/components/marketing/HowItW: Displays a five‑step visual workflow with icons and descriptions for the product’s process.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Indust: Renders a grid of industry cards with icons, titles, and short descriptions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, managing login, logout, and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future React Query hooks interacting with the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitLead.ts: Hook for submitting lead data through the backend actor with status and error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, themes, global styles, and utility gradients.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, Query Client, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/SofteviaLandingPage.t: Landing page combining marketing sections, hero content, and lead capture dialog triggers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors using OKLCH variables, extended animations, shadows, fonts, and includes typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, goals, SEO requirements, features, and image needs for building a B2B SaaS landing page for Softevia.
